entities.name: mad eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a person who wants to wait for Sturgis. He is mentioned as someone who would have helped the group if Arthur could get cars from the Ministry again.

entities.name: sturgis
entities.description: Sturgis is a person that Mad-Eye wants to wait for. He is not mentioned by name, but his presence is implied as something that Mad-Eye is waiting for.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is a person who could have gotten cars from the Ministry again. He is mentioned as someone who would have helped the group if he had been able to do so.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who wouldn't let Arthur borrow anything, including an empty ink bottle. He is mentioned as someone who has become more restrictive in his lending practices.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who has been trapped inside for a very long time. He is mentioned as someone who is now free and able to accompany Harry and the others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is accompanying Sirius and the others on their journey. He is mentioned as someone who is laughing at Sirius's antics.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a person who purses her lips in an almost Aunt Petunia-ish way. She is mentioned as someone who is accompanying Harry and the others on their journey.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is a person who is mentioned as an example of someone who would purse her lips in a similar way to Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: king's cross
entities.description: King's Cross is a location that the group reaches by foot after twenty minutes of walking. It is mentioned as a place where they linger casually before proceeding further.
